# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $10,000. This is a special offer tailored to your needs and I'm confident it represents an excellent opportunity for both of us. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations or if there's any way I can assist you further. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
